features: Whisker Friendly: Oval shaped cat dish specifically designed to alleviate stress on cats that experience irritation when whiskers contact bowls while eating or drinking
Designed For Cats: Shallow saucer style bowl enables cat and kitten to easily reach food and water while keeping their faces clean and dry
Safe And Hygienic: Made of hand crafted 100% ceramic stoneware and glazed to form a non-porous shield. Made to FDA standards
Unique Design: Formed in the shape of a cat head with painted cat face in the bowl basin is creative and adds to home and kitchen décor
Organizes Cat Dining: Ideal for both food and water including wet or dry cat food
body.description: Frisky Kitty oval stoneware cat saucer is a sturdy, dishwasher safe and microwave cat food or water bowl. It has a decorative cat face in the basin helping the make the cat dining area more attractive. The oval shape is preferred by cats as it allows them to eat or drink without touching their whiskers on the bowl or saucer. This saucer is made to FDA standards and is great for cats of all sizes. Glazed stoneware bowls eliminate porous surfaces. This product is easy to clean and is heavy enough to keep the bowl in place while cats are eating or drinking. This saucer is available in black, white, pink, and blue. Capacity is measured in liquid form at 5.3 ounces. The oval shape is 5.5 inches wide and the saucer is 1.5 inches tall and is ideal for wet cat food, dry cat food or water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These dishes are super cute and hold a large can of cat food easily. Easy to clean and well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and won't hit kitty's whiskers.
reviews.reviewText: [Updated 12/10/16: New home, a new cat, and ~10 months going by means I feel the need to add some info in here. You can find that at the bottom.]My cats are in love! They both love eating from the dish. I was looking for a wide, shallow bowl that wouldn't hit their whiskers when they tried to eat. (My cats are among the many who are sensitive and won't eat from a dish that their whiskers touch. If you'd like more info, Google "whisker fatigue.") I also wanted it to be small so that the food wouldn't get old. With bigger bowls, I usually wind up tossing part of the dry food out since it gets old before they can eat it all. While I have to fill the bowls up quite often and some pet owners may find that irksome, I personally prefer it that way.I also bought PetRageous Oval Frisky Kitty Pet Bowl, 5.5-Inch, Black . I thought it'd be cute to have one white bowl and one black one, but for some reason, the cats refused to eat from the black one. I experimented with switching the placement of the bowls and so forth, but both of them still only ate from the white one. I wound up ordering another white one, and now they're perfectly content. (And spoiled. Both things.)One last possibly useful attribute: it says on the bottom that it's dishwasher safe. I don't have a dishwasher, so I can't test that claim, but if it's true, that's awesome.Attached are pictures to show what the bowl looks like with and without food, as well as a size comparison next to my cat Rootie. She's way more excited about the bowl than she looks, trust me.Bottom line: looks great, is sold for a fantastic price, and the cats love it. Highly recommend it!---Edited on 12/10/2016: It has been roughly ten months since I bought the first bowl. As I was only the foster home for my prior cats, I now have an entirely new one. That means I can give the opinions of three separate cats now (which obviously is super important because cats, that's why).Some other observations:1) Not only did the bowls survive two separate moves from city to city, but it took eight months and a direct fall onto the kitchen tile for one to break. Even then, it was a drop from high up and only the ears broke off. These things are incredibly durable.2) My (new) cat LOVES the black bowl I previously mentioned the other ones not liking. It seems that whether or not a cat will be bothered by the bowl color depends on the cat itself.3) Now that I have a dishwasher, I was able to test the claim over it being dishwasher-safe. The answer is a resounding yes. I do it all the time. There has been no harm to the bowl, so no worries there. (There is some color fading on the back, but I'm pretty sure that's because I wash it so much.)4) In my original review, I forgot to mention that it also says it is microwave-safe. That's come in handy lately as well.To state the obvious, I still highly recommend these bowls. If anything, I do so even more now that I'm aware of their sturdiness. Seeing as three out of three cat experts prefer these bowls over all others, it seems I am stuck buying the dishes forever. Luckily, I'm good with that. :)(I'm adding two pictures in addition to the others from before. The first is simply the back of the bowl, so you can see both what it says and also the minor discoloration I'm talking about. The second picture is my new cat with the bowl as she sniffs it out and silently judges me for the lack of food in it. That one is so you can see the color hasn't faded despite the time that's passed, as well as to give a little more size proportion since she is a bit larger than the foster cat in the other picture.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just the right size!
reviews.reviewText: I have one for my cat…. Perfect for her meals or treats. Had to order one for my granddaughter’s cat for a gift. I’m certain she’ll love it too. It doesn’t slip around, it’s easy to clean, and it’s cute to boot!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and pretty cat food bowl
reviews.reviewText: Seems to be well made and sturdy enough for every day use. Cute graphics!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds the cat Food well
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy, easy to clean, stable and they can't tip it over, and like the colors And design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but breakable
reviews.reviewText: We used this dish for our cat for a couple of years. It was very cute and we liked it. After about a year, we dropped it in the sink and one of the ears broke off. A couple of days ago, the bowl was dropped and it shattered. While I thought it was cute, I will probably stick to non-breakable material for my cat bowls in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my 7lb Chihuahua
reviews.reviewText: I bought these cute little bowls over a year ago, after searching everywhere for small bowls for my little dog that didn't cost a fortune. I needed something I would be able to pop in the microwave to warm up his food, then toss in the dishwasher for an easy clean up. These little bowls are perfect!!! They do everything I need, are cute and have lasted through many microwave heat ups and dishwasher clean ups and still look great. Even though they are meant for cats, I don't think my dog minds a bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Microwaveable
reviews.reviewText: My senior cat does not eat as much as she used to, so this small bowl is just right to heat and serve her food. It is not deep, but that is why I purchased it, because it is shallow and easy for her to eat from, along with the fact it is microwaveable and super cute.

reviews.reviewerName: Scan Thriller Fan and Cat person
reviews.reviewTitle: Good style for a messy eater
reviews.reviewText: Finding the best dish for a messy eater is difficult. These little dishes are perfect for one of my cats.

reviews.reviewTitle: Super cute and easy to clean!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for our kitten. Using dry and wet food and I find it very easy to clean and none of the markings are coming off. Perfect size for not overfeeding the cat.

reviews.reviewTitle: Hermoso plato y con un gran diseño
reviews.reviewText: Está hermoso el plato, de muy buen material y le cabe una buena porción de croquetas.
Strong, beautiful, funny, the ideal size, these gamelles are wonderful! Ces gamelles à chat sont adorables et tout el monde en est fou
Small but still suitable for biscuits and food.Will buy more later.
